titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon some passages in a book entituled The true nature of a gospel-church and its government written (as it is said by the publisher) by John Owen.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Edmund Elys.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
